TrapRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the poisoned pit trap! I saw the Bard puke their guts, sir
TrapRoom.fail_text: The delvers have risked the jump and fallen in! Their wounds seep black, sir
TrapRoom.pass_text: The delvers have summoned a magical bridge across! They... are unharmed, sir

CombatRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the worlf pens! The Thief shivered, sir
CombatRoom.fail_text: The delvers have been sniffed out and ambushed! They've been gnashed ragged, sir
CombatRoom.pass_text: The delvers have dressed as brears and scared the wolves away! They... are unharmed, sir

PuzzleRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the clockwork crane! The Knight is fuming, sir
PuzzleRoom.fail_text: The delvers have been forced to climb out without the crane's aid! They look exhausted, sir
PuzzleRoom.pass_text: The delvers have connected the crane to its lost ancestors! They've been... listed safely out of the roon, sir

SocialRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the spirit coven's chambers! The Wizard was held back, sir
SocialRoom.fail_text: The delvers have been turned into frogs! (But they got better) they struggle to speak, sir
SocialRoom.pass_text: The delvers have negotiated a truce between the witches due to their shared hatred of laundry! Their backs have been... patted, sir

EnvironmentalRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the rush blood gorge! The Wizard recoiled from the smell, sir
EnvironmentalRoom.fail_text: The delvers have been forced to swim through! They look sickly, sir
EnvironmentalRoom.pass_text: The delvers have found our bathing nook and bounced over on a wave of lather! They... are squeaky clean, sir

RichesRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the hoard of the boar lord! The Knight burst into a lecture, sir
RichesRoom.fail_text: The delvers have been battered by a porcine stampede! Their rations have been scoffed, sir
RichesRoom.pass_text: The delvers have realised the boar lord's truffles are a priceless hair growth potion ingredient! They... have gained renewed bounce and body to their curls, sir

KnowledgeRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the lint scroll vortex! The Bard was hit with a fit of sneezes, sir
KnowledgeRoom.fail_text: The delvers have accidentally shredded the scrolls! They struggle to breath due to the dust cloud, sir
KnowledgeRoom.pass_text: The delvers have learned the language of infinite pockets by eating a mushroom they found! They... are vibing, sir

HonourRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the beetle mill! They tore up their map in apparent frustration, sir
HonourRoom.fail_text: The delvers have spent hours arguing with each other! Their equipment is dented from trying failed schemes, sir
HonourRoom.pass_text: The delvers have obtained beetle bread! They have gained the proprotional strength of an insect from eating beetle bread! They... are stuffed, sir

GloryRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the nest of the ink crows! The Rogue stayed down and heavily critiqued their party-mates
GloryRoom.fail_text: The delvers have lost their best jewels to the crow's pecking! They tore up their side-quest poster, sir
GloryRoom.pass_text: The delvers have entranced the crows with a rainbow scattering lends and rescued the emo kids of Proxim village! They... are considered muses, sir

HealRoom.entry_text: The delvers have reached the immortal meadow! They visibly frolic, sir
HealRoom.fail_text: The delvers have fallen victim to the meadow's magical perfume! They struggle to tell dream from reality, sir
HealRoom.pass_text: The delvers have sang with the forget-me-nots and now know the true meaning of life! They... have inspired apostles, sir

start_room.entry_text: The delvers have reached a new level, sir
start_room.fail_text: There wasn't even a challenge here, I'm not sure how they failed, sir
start_room.pass_text: They succeded as finding their way through a one way staircase, sir

end_room.entry_text: The delvers have reached the end of the level, sir
end_room.fail_text: They're in pretty bad shape, sir
end_room.pass_text: Let's throw a boss at them, sir
